info.joined guild: Joined guild! Nº: {bot.guild_count:,} • Name: {guild.name} • Members: {guild.member_count:,} • ID: {guild.id}
info.ping: Pong! DWSP latency: {dwspl:,.0f} ms. Response time: - ms.
info.pong: Pong! DWSP latency: {dwspl:,.0f} ms. Response time: {rt:,.0f} ms.
info.server prefix: S4's prefix in this server is {pfx}. To change it, use `@S4 config system prefix <new prefix>`.
info.unable to kick: Failed to kick {member.display_name} as their permission set is superior to S4's.
info.unable to ban: Failed to ban {member.display_name} as their permission set is superior to S4's.
info.unable to clear nick: Failed to clear the nickname of {member.display_name} as their permission set is superior to S4's.

error.command went wrong: Something went wrong (ref: {ref}). Quote this reference in the support server, which you can get a link for by using `@S4 support`.
error.missing required argument: No `{exc.param}` argument was passed, despite being required. Use `@S4 help {cmd}` for more information.
error.bad argument: One or more arguments are invalid. Use `@S4 help {cmd}` for more information.
error.too many arguments: Too many arguments have been passed. Use `@S4 help {cmd}` for more information.
error.missing permissions: You do not have the {missing_perms} permission(s), which are required to use this command.
error.bot missing permissions: S4 does not have the {missing_perms} permission(s), which are required to use this command.
error.not owner: That command can only be used by S4's owner.
error.command on user cooldown: You can not use that commands for another {length}.
error.command on guild cooldown: That command can not be used in this server for another {length}.
error.command on channel cooldown: That command can not be used in this channel for another {length}.
error.command on member cooldown: You can not use that command in this server for another {length}.
error.command on category cooldown: That command can not be used in this category for another {length}.
error.invalid end of quoted string error: S4 expected a space after the closing quote, but found a(n) `{exc.char}` instead.
error.expected closing quote error: S4 expected a closing quote character, but did not find one.
error.user input error: There was an unhandled user input problem (probably argument passing error). Use `@S4 help {cmd}` for more information.
error.check failure: There was an unhandled command check error (probably missing privileges). Use `@S4 help {cmd}` for more information.
error.bot is not ready: S4 is still booting and is not ready to receive commands. Please try again later.
error.module is not ready: The {module} module is still initialising and is not ready to receive commands. Please try again later.
error.command does not exist: S4 has no commands or aliases with that name.
error.no help available: No help is available for that command.
error.invalid user: S4 was unable to identify a user with the information provided.
error.invalid guild: S4 was unable to identify a server with the information provided.
error.invalid member: S4 was unable to identify a server member with the information provided.
error.delete message days outside bounds: The number of days to delete is outside valid bounds - it should be between 0 and 7 inclusive.
error.scan outside bounds: The number of messages to clear is outside valid bounds - it should be between 1 and 100 inclusive.
error.nickname too long: Nicknames can not be more than 32 characters in length.
error.nickname change failed: S4 could not set that member's nickname due to a permissions problem.
error.nickname unhoist failed: None of members specficied has hoisted nicknames, or S4 failed to changed any hoisted nicknames.
